description:
I saw a collectibles banner on Phantom, when I clicked it I was directed to the https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmRfZPJth42hAUMYseCgSrdwZnJFYzUmBLbrHhqME2cXZa, after opening it I was asked to connect my wallet, it turned out my money was gone.

I saw a collectibles banner on Phantom, when I clicked it I was directed to the https://ipfs.io/ipfs/QmRfZPJth42hAUMYseCgSrdwZnJFYzUmBLbrHhqME2cXZa, after opening it I was asked to connect my wallet, it turned out my money was gone.

Amount lost

1536.00 USD
